entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
